name: Litmus Marine Innovation
overview:
Established in year 2007, “Litmus Marine Innovation Private Limited” Innovation is a Marine Company, which stands for providing unparalleled quality and innovative marine products to our esteemed clients across Marine & Tourism Industry.

Our Products: Navy & Military Commercial Marina Sea & Difficult Water Marine Sea & Difficult Water l Engineering Marina Leisure & Recreation Boat Drive On Dock Jet Ski Drive-On

Careers: Litmus Marine is an energizing professional workplace. We seek candidates from a wide range of backgrounds, intellectually curious, hard work ethic and self-starters. Our candidates typically come from well-reputed specialized fields and have a strong academic record.

Quality Assurance: Being a quality conscious organization, we pay utmost attention towards quality standard of our services and products offered by us. So for the reason, we have appointed experienced professionals who check the products offered by us on various parameters of quality and performance, before the final delivery.

Clientele: Since our commencement, we are focused towards attaining maximum satisfaction level of our customers. Owing to this reason, we are committed towards offering superior quality services and products to our clients across the region.

Our Professional Team: We are supported by team of experienced and qualified professionals in every stage of our trade related activities. All these professionals are well versed with industry guidelines and market trends. l Engineering Marina
